title: Jorgenson Unrattled Under Final Stage Pressure for Second-Straight GC Win at Paris-Nice
content:
Huge day for USA as 22-year-old Sheffield wins stage solo and Jorgenson defends overnight GC lead in aggressive three-hour thrill-ride around Nice.

Read the full article at Jorgenson Unrattled Under Final Stage Pressure for Second-Straight GC Win at Paris-Nice on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
